name: The Snarky Babysitters
description: Two biopunk babysitters run into each other at a shop and start bonding over the When you are sitting in a cafe, a man strikes. up a conversation with you and you start to talk to him. then comes the realization that you guys have the same job AND babysitting the same child! You guys start to bond over it but will it go further or will it fizzle out?
